title: Consumer spending on mobile games in the U.S. 2014 to 2016
summary: This statistic provides an estimate of the mobile and footwear e-commerce sales in U.S. 2014 , 2015 and 2016 .
In 2014 , spending mobile and footwear sales amounted to 1,880 million IDR ( approximately 151 million U.S. dollars ) .
gold: This statistic gives information on the overall amount spent on mobile games by mobile games in the United States from 2014 to 2016.
During the last reported period , it was found that the average overall mobile gaming expenditure per user amounted to 77.6 U.S. dollars .
